Package gobblin.writer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ackable
    An interface for entities that can be acked
    AsyncDataWriter<D>
    An interface for implementing Async Writers for Gobblin.
    BatchAsyncDataWriter<D>
    An interface for implementing Async Writers for Gobblin.
    SyncDataWriter<D>
    An interface to implement Synchronous (Blocking) Data writers
    WatermarkAwareWriter<D>
    A DataWriter that is WatermarkAware.
    WatermarkManager
    An interface for WatermarkManagers: classes that can keep track of watermarks and commit them to watermark storage.
    WatermarkTracker
    An interface for a WatermarkTracker.
    WriteCallback<T>  
    WriteResponse<T>
    A class for encapsulating the system-native response and general statistics from a write
    WriteResponseMapper<InnerType>
    An interface to implement a transformer from a system-native response type into a WriteResponse.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcknowledgableRecordEnvelope<D>
    An envelope for record, watermark pairs that need to be acknowledged.
    AcknowledgableWatermark
    A Checkpointable Watermark that can be acknowledged.
    AsyncWriterManager<D>
    A Data Writer to use as a base for writing async writers.
    AsyncWriterManager.AsyncWriterManagerBuilder  
    Batch<D>
    An Batch class that contains all the records pushed by BatchAccumulator.
    BatchAccumulator<D>
    An accumulator which groups multiple records into a batch How batching strategy works depends on the real implementation One way to do this is scanning all the internal batches through an iterator
    BufferedAsyncDataWriter<D>
    An async data writer which can achieve the buffering and batching capability.
    BytesBoundedBatch<D>
    A batch which internally saves each record in memory with bounded size limit Also a TTL value is configured, so that an eviction policy can be applied form upper layer.
    FineGrainedWatermarkTracker
    A class to handle fine-grain watermarks.
    GenericWriteResponse<T>
    A generic write response to wrap responses from other systems.
    GenericWriteResponseWrapper<T>  
    LastWatermarkTracker
    A WatermarkTracker that only tracks the last committed watermark and doesn't compare previous existing watermarks.
    MultiWriterWatermarkManager
    Responsible for managing continuous commit of watermarks.
    MultiWriterWatermarkTracker
    A helper class that tracks committed and uncommitted watermarks.
    PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder<S,D>
    A DataWriterBuilder used with a WriterPartitioner.
    RecordFuture
    A future object generated after a record was inserted into a batch We can include more meta data about this record in the future
    RecordMetadata  
    SequentialBasedBatchAccumulator<D>
    Sequential and TTL based accumulator A producer can add a record to this accumulator.
    TrackerBasedWatermarkManager
    Responsible for managing continuous commit of watermarks.
    WatermarkAwareWriterWrapper<D>
    A convenience wrapper class for WatermarkAware writers.
    WatermarkManager.CommitStatus  
    WatermarkManager.RetrievalStatus  
    WatermarkTrackerFactory
    A Factory for handing out WatermarkTracker instances
    WatermarkTrackerFactory.TrackerBehavior  
    WriteResponseFuture<InnerType>
    Wraps a Future and implements a Future when provided with a wrapper class
